extendedInfo.description: Candy Game begins as a simple match three boardgame and gradually increases difficulties as obstaclesare added and level objectives becomes morechallenging.--------------------------------------------------------There are three possible objectives on each level.1. Score quota2. Removing dark pulps3. Bringing down fruits.There are two possible challenges on each level.1. Complete the objective before time runs out.2 Complete the objective before you run out of swaps.--------------------------------------------------------Obstacles.1. Chocolate bar: A chocolate can not be moved, can only be   cleared if an adjacent candy is cleared or if a striped    candy or a double candy power up is triggered.Matching 4 or more candies rewards the player witha power up candy. There are 3 power ups.1. Striped candy (horizontal and vertical stripe).2. Double candy.3. Lollipop candy.--------------------------------------------------------Striped candy power up.To create a striped candy you need to match 4 candies in a row or column.Matching a striped candy with 2 other candies of thesame type will trigger the power up.Striped candy when triggered will clear the row or column depending on the candy stripe.1. Horizontal stripe is created when 4 candies are   matched in the same column.2. Vertical stripe is created when 4 candies are matched   in the same row.--------------------------------------------------------Double candy power up.To create a double candy, you need to match intersectingcandies of the same type in a column and row,Matching a double candy with 2 other candies of thesame type will trigger the power up.Double candy when triggered will clear the adjacentcandies around the double candy.--------------------------------------------------------Lollipop candy power up.There are two possible ways to create the Lollipop power up candy.1. Matching 5 candies of the same type.2. Matching 2 types of candies in one swap in a single row or column.Swapping a lollipop candy with a regular candy,will clear all the regular candy of the same type.Swapping a lollipop candy with striped candy, willtransform all the regular candy of the same typeto a striped candy power up and triggers the stripedcandy power up.Swapping a lollipop candy with a double candy willtransform all the regular candy of the same typeto a double candy power up and triggers thedouble candy power up.Swapping a lollipop candy with another lollipopcandy will clear all the candies. --------------------------------------------------------Power ups can be swapped with any other power ups.Striped candy swapped with another striped candy clearsall the candies in a row and columndouble candy swapped with another double candy clearsa seven by seven block of candies. ( 7 rows x 7 columns)Striped candy swapped with a double candy clearsthree vertical rows of candy and 3 horizontal columnsof candies.--------------------------------------------------------Objectives.1. Score quota -  You need to reach a certain score in order to level up.2. Remove dark pulps.   dark pulps are removed by clearing the candy ontop of the dark pulp.    There are 3 levels of dark pulps. The darkest pulp needs to be removed   3 times, which means you need clear 3 candies ontop of that dark pulp.     Chocolates also creates a level 3 dark pulp and needs to be cleared.3. Bring down the fruit.   Bring down the fruits to level up.--------------------------------------------------------Challenges.1. Time challenged.   Complete the objective(s) before time runs out.2. Swap limit.   Complete the objective(s) before you run out of swaps.Obstacles.1. Chocolate bar    A chocolate can only be cleared by clearing out   an adjacent candy. Once the chocolate is cleared it becomes    a level 3 dark pulp.

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: At the end. Need more levels please
reviews.author: Dizey Magoo

reviews.title: *Edit* update sucks.
reviews.comment: Changing my review. Gameplay is still fun. Update sucked. The new candy shapes look terrible and the ad to purchase/play another game still comes up after every game and at the title.   Definitely headed in the wrong direction.
reviews.author: Colin Johnson

reviews.title: Decent Candy Crush Clone
reviews.comment: Candy Crush itself is of course a \"beautified\" clone of Bejeweled, so let\'s not take anything away from Candy Game (Crunch). Gameplay is fine, the levels are a bit too few, but altogether worth a dollar. It is not without shortcomings,  however, such as the inability to detect no further moves possible and automatically reshuffle. Changing the shapes of the \"candies\" in the latest version was also a strange move because it added nothing to the game while making them look less like candies!
reviews.author: Kevin Chan

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: It great to be able to play a game that is not linked with Facebook. I love it. Only wish it would stop crashing on me!
reviews.author: Nigel Campbell

reviews.title: PERFECT!
reviews.comment: OMG THIS CANDY CRUNCH GAME IS SO COOL I JUST LOVE IT. ITS NOT AS CHANNELING AS CANDY CRUSH BUT THAT\'S OK BECAUSE EVEN THOUGH CANDY CRUSH HAS MANY MANY LEVELS TOO ENJOY IT FRUSTRATS ME. I SAY THAT BECAUSE MOST OF THE LEVELS IS WAY TOO DIFFICULT TOO GET OFF OF.
reviews.author: Trina Valencia

reviews.title: If you like candy crush, you will LOVE candy crunch!
reviews.comment: Love the different powerups! I noticed today the name changed to \"Candy Game\" .... I bought the game when it was candy crunch. Will I still get updates, or do I need to download the new name/game?
reviews.author: Lorie Larson

reviews.title: Nice version
reviews.comment: Crunchy! Sweet tasting! Go Jellybeans! lol, these are the voice over of the game. The gameplay and powerups won\'t disappoint. Nice version and similarly addictive.
reviews.author: A Google User
